tags: Protection against carbon leakage through Carbon – Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM)
excerpt: On 1 October 2023, the Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) will enter its transitional phase and will fundamentally change the import of goods into the European Economic Area.
